files.description: Package initializer for the minimal meta-analysis starter kit used by the runnable analysis skeleton.
Implements CSV template/schema handling and robust loading/validation of extracted study-level effect size data.
Provides core meta-analysis computations (toy fixed-effect and random-effects pooling) and produces numeric summary tables.
Builds and writes analysis outputs (summary CSV tables) into runtime/outputs/_build/ in a reproducible structure.
Explains how to use the starter kit templates and run the analysis to generate at least one numeric summary table in runtime/outputs/_build/.
CSV extraction template defining the standardized study-level inputs required to run the starter meta-analysis workflow.
Small toy dataset (filled example) matching the extraction template to enable a fully runnable end-to-end meta-analysis output.
Runnable analysis skeleton script that loads the toy or user-filled CSV, runs pooling, and saves numeric summary outputs to runtime/outputs/_build/.
Keeps the build output directory tracked so generated summary tables can be written to runtime/outputs/_build/ during runs.

missionDescription: Create and run a minimal meta-analysis starter kit in runtime/outputs (CSV extraction templates + a runnable analysis skeleton) that produces at least one numeric summary table (e.g., pooled estimate on toy data) saved to runtime/outputs/_build/ (addresses audit gap: 0 analysis outputs).
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Portfolio priorities emphasize goal_23, but the audit shows no analysis outputs; a minimal runnable pipeline is required to close the loop.
projectName: and run a minimal meta-analysis starter kit in runtime/outputs (CSV extraction templates + a runnable analysis skeleton) that produces at least one numeric summary table (e.g., pooled estimate on toy data) saved to runtime/outputs/_build/ (addresses audit gap: 0 analysis outputs).
